column4: Hello all, I have installed Ubuntu 11.10 on my old PC from yesterday and it's on 100% cpu usage nad use 1000/1000 memory.. what can I do?
Or I need to install older version of Ubuntu like 10.04?
AMD Sempron 3000+ 2x512 MB ram DDR2 800 MHz
lubuntu or xubuntu are better for low end machines. but thats not too bad a box
